item.title: Mathjax and code-highlighting test
item.author: Mike Rooney
item.description: The Gamma function satisfying \(\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!\quad\forall n\in\mathbb N\) is via through the Euler integral $$ \Gamma(z) = \int_0^\infty t^{z-1}e^{-t}dt\,. $$

item.title: Design is a distracting hobby
item.author: Mike Rooney
item.description: This post warrants a disclaimer: I have never once considered myself a designer; I have only the smallest quantity of "artistic taste". This is said so as to dispel any presumptuous airs that may stink up what I am about to say. I have never had much occasion to think about visual design before this...

item.title: A blogging alter ego is born... Mr. Mundane
item.author: Mike Rooney
item.description: Why am I going through the trouble of establishing a personal website? I asked myself this question many times over as I perused listings of today's most popular static site generators. Despite the likelihood my current enthusiasm will shrivel, and the rate of updates will become a dribble, I just...
